content.en: Cloud optimization: Researchers have been exploring how deep reinforcement learning algorithms can be used to improve various aspects of cloud computing. These algorithms, such as deep Q-network and deep reinforcement Q-learning, are being applied to tasks like job scheduling, resource management, load balancing, and task scheduling. By using these algorithms, researchers aim to optimize performance, reduce energy costs, and improve the overall efficiency of cloud-based applications.
content.da: Skyoptimering: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan algoritmer for dyb forstærkningslæring kan bruges til at forbedre forskellige aspekter af cloud computing. Disse algoritmer, såsom deep Q-netværk og deep reinforcement Q-learning, anvendes til opgaver som jobplanlægning, ressourceadministration, belastningsafbalancering og opgaveplanlægning. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at optimere ydeevnen, reducere energikostnader og forbedre den samlede effektivitet af cloud-baserede applikationer.
